美術評論家: (びじゅつひょうろんか) - art critic
美術運動: (びじゅつうんどう) - art movement
美術館: (bijutsukan) - galeria de arte, museu de arte
美貌: (びぼう) - beautiful face; good looks; beauty
美辞麗句: (びじれいく) - (yoji) flowery words; rhetorical flourishes
美辞麗句を連ねる: (びじれいくをつらねる) - to declaim; to string together all sorts of flowery words
美酒に酔う: (びしゅによう) - to enjoy a good drink (esp. celebrating victory)
美酒佳肴: (びしゅかこう) - (yoji) fine wines and prized delicacies
美醜: (びしゅう) - beauty or ugliness; personal appearance/looks
美青年: (びせいねん) - handsome young man; Adonis
美顔術: (びがんじゅつ) - facial care or treatment
美風: (びふう) - beautiful custom; fine custom; good custom
美食: (びしょく) - delicious or gourmet food
美魔女: (びまじょ) - middle-aged woman who looks very young for her age (as through "magic")
羗: (きょう) - Tribos no Oeste da China Fortes
羝羊: (ていよう) - ram (sheep); used to liken one to someone who lives their life by instinct
羞じらう: (はじらう) - to feel shy; to be bashful; to blush
羞悪: (しゅうお) - shame and hatred of evil
羞月閉花: (しゅうげつへいか) - (yoji) the charms of a uniquely beautiful woman; (so beautiful that) the moon is abashed and flowers wilt
群: (arma/mu) - flock , group, bunch, crowd, throng, swarm, band; group
群々: (ムラムラ) - irresistibly/suddenly; to be turned on/to be horny
群がり: (むらがり) - crowding together; grouping together; swarming; crowd; group; swarm
群がる: (むらがる) - to swarm; to gather
群に分ける: (ぐんにわける) - to divide into groups
群れ: (mure) - group, crowd, flock, herd, bevy, school, swarm, cluster (ex. de estrelas), clump, pack (e.g. of dogs)
群れる: (むれる) - to crowd; to flock; to swarm
群れ居る: (むれいる) - to crowd in; to come together
群れ遊ぶ: (むれあそぶ) - to play in a group
群れ集まる: (むれあつまる) - to gather in large groups
群をなして: (ぐんをなして) - in crowds; in a group; in swarms
群をなす: (ぐんをなす) - to swarm; to crowd; to flock together
群を成して: (ぐんをなして) - in crowds; in a group; in swarms
群を成す: (ぐんをなす) - to swarm; to crowd; to flock together
群を抜く: (ぐんをぬく) - to surpass the rest (e.g. of a large group); to stand out from the crowd; to be the best by far
群伝搬時間: (ぐんでんぱんじかん) - group delay (in fibre optics, fiber optics)
群俗: (ぐんぞく) - the masses; the people; populace
群千鳥: (むらちどり) - flocking plovers; flock of plovers
群居る: (むれいる) - to crowd in; to come together
群山: (むらやま) - mountain range; cluster of mountains; mountainous region
群峰: (ぐんぽう) - (the many peaks of a) mountain range
群時雨: (むらしぐれ) - autumn shower; fall shower
群書: (ぐんしょ) - many books; many writings
群棲地: (ぐんせいち) - rookery; breeding grounds; nesting place
群烏: (むらがらす) - flock of crows; murder of crows
群生: (ぐんじょう) - (ぐんせい only) growing en masse in a location (plants); (ぐんせい only) living gregariously (animals, people); all animate creation
群発性頭痛: (ぐんぱつせいずつう) - cluster headache
群盲: (ぐんもう) - the blind or foolish masses
群盲象を撫ず: (ぐんもうぞうをなず) - the mediocre have no right to criticize the great
群盲象を撫でる: (ぐんもうぞうをなでる) - the mediocre have no right to criticize the great
群盲象を評す: (ぐんもうぞうをひょうす) - (proverb)   the mediocre cannot understand the great
群竹: (むらたけ) - thick growth of bamboo
群系: (ぐんけい) - {bot} formation; classification of plant communities
群羊: (ぐんよう) - flock of sheep; collection of weaklings
群羊を駆って猛虎を攻む: (ぐんようをかってもうこをせむ) - Union is strength
群群: (ムラムラ) - irresistibly/suddenly; to be turned on/to be horny
群肝の: (むらきもの) - (pillow word for 心)  amassed feeling; build-up (of thoughts)
群臣: (ぐんしん) - a crowd or large number of one's retainers or subjects
群落: (ぐんらく) - many communities (villages); cluster of plants
群衆: (ぐんじゅ) - group (of people); crowd; horde; throng; mob; multitude
